metadata.dc:author: Pedreira, J L
Mendoza, E
metadata.dc:description: Psychological effects of hemodyalisis in children with chronic renal failure are studied based on the significance of micturition and chronic disease in child's mind. The condition is analyzed in three stages: dietetics, fistula on the beginning of treatment and long-term hemodyalisis.
metadata.dc:title: Aspectos psicopatológicos del niño en hemodiálisis.
[Psychopathological aspects of children on hemodialysis].
